segments.text: I see an adult woman standing calmly at the kitchen sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her back is mostly to me, but I can tell she's focused on the plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying it meticulously with a dish towel, completely absorbed in the task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing over the front edge of the basin and onto the cabinets below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a wide puddle on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her one foot is actually standing right in the water, yet she shows absolutely no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's genuinely astounding to witness such obliviousness to an immediate problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried about the damage this water will cause to the wooden cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This quiet scene is about to become a very wet disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she looks down soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The amount of water pooling is quite significant already.
segments.speaker: PAR
